mapper.sql: id, recordNo, sequencNo, volumeid, deadline, department, year, operator,address,tableid,description, pagenum,checkstatus, subject, createtime, updatetime

dd.id as id, recordNo, sequencNo, volumeid, deadline, department, year, operator,address,tableid,subject, createtime,checkstatus, description, pagenum, updatetime,year.name as yearname,deadline.name as deadlinename, department.name as departmentname
mapper.select:
select
from (select
from ${tableName} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as dd join year on dd.year = `year`.id join deadline on dd.deadline = deadline.id join department on dd.department = department.id

select count(*) from ${tablename} where checkstatus=1
and ${co.fieldname} = #{co.value}
select id from ${tablename} where no = #{value}

select
from (select
from ${tableName} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as dd join year on dd.year = `year`.id join deadline on dd.deadline = deadline.id join department on dd.department = department.id
mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} (id, recordNo, sequencNo, volumeid, deadline,pagenum,description, department, year, operator,address, subject,checkstatus, createtime, updatetime) values (#{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.sequencno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.volumeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.pagenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.checkstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update ${tableName} set recordNo = #{record.recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tableid = #{record.tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sequencNo = #{record.sequencno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkstatus = #{record.checkstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volumeid = #{record.volumeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{record.deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pagenum = #{record.pagenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{record.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject = #{record.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ${tablename}

select
( CASE WHEN Department.NAME = NULL THEN Record.department ELSE Department. NAME END ) AS department,
( CASE WHEN Deadline.NAME = NULL THEN Record.deadline ELSE Deadline.NAME END ) AS deadline,
( CASE WHEN Department. NAME = NULL THEN Record.year ELSE Year.NAME END ) AS year,
( CASE WHEN ${field.fieldname}. NAME = NULL THEN Record.${field.fieldname} ELSE ${field.fieldname}. NAME END ) AS ${field.fieldname},
${field.fieldname} ,
from ${tablename} as Record
left join ${field.fieldname} on ${field.fieldname}.id = Record.${field.fieldname}
left join department as Department on Department.id = Record.department left join deadline as Deadline on Deadline.id = Record.deadline left join year as Year on Year.id = Record.year where Record.id = #{recordid}

select
( CASE WHEN Department.no = NULL THEN Record.department ELSE Department. no END ) AS department,
( CASE WHEN Deadline.no = NULL THEN Record.deadline ELSE Deadline.no END ) AS deadline,
( CASE WHEN Year. no = NULL THEN Record.year ELSE Year.no END ) AS year,
( CASE WHEN ${field.fieldname}. no = NULL THEN Record.${field.fieldname} ELSE ${field.fieldname}. no END ) AS ${field.fieldname},
from ${tablename} as Record
left join ${field.fieldname} on ${field.fieldname}.id = Record.${field.fieldname}
left join department as Department on Department.id = Record.department left join deadline as Deadline on Deadline.id = Record.deadline left join year as Year on Year.id = Record.year where Record.id = #{recordid}
select * from ${tablename} where id = #{recordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from checkinfo where recordid = #{recordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select info from checkinfo where recordid = #{recordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by updatetime desc limit 1

select count(*) from ${tableName} where checkstatus=1
and ${col.colid} like '%' #{col.colvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
select subject from ${tableName} where id = #{id}
select volumeNo from ${tableName} where id = #{id}
select count(*) from ${tableName}

select
distinct * from ${tablePrefix}_record where volumeid in (select volumeid from ${tablePrefix}_volume where volumeNo = #{volumeNo})

select count(*) from ${tableName} where checkstatus=1
and ${col.colid} like '%' #{col.colvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'

select * from ${tableName} where checkstatus=1
and ${col.colid} like '%' #{col.colvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
limit ${start},${end} order by recordNo
